udpListener - Static variable in class controller.UserController
 
UDPListener - Class in network
UDPListener class is used to listen for UDP incoming packets on a given port, we can listen for connexion responses, changing pseudo response
UDPListener(int) - Constructor for class network.UDPListener
Constructor of the UDPListener class
UDPSender - Class in network
UDPSender class is used to send UDP packets We can send messages to a specific port or in broadcast
UDPSender() - Constructor for class network.UDPSender
UDPSender constructor
updateChat() - Method in class view.OpenedChatFrame
It updates the chat displayed It is called when the user clicks on the button "Search" It is called when the user clicks on the button "Cross"
updateChatPane() - Method in class view.MainFrame
It update the chat pane It is called when the chatter selected change It hides the parameters pane if there is one displayed It opens a chat pane with the selected user
updateChatter() - Method in class view.MainFrame
Update the chatter when the user select a user in the list of the users online It is called when the user click on a user in the UsersList It hides the parameters pane if there is one displayed It opens a chat pane with the selected user
updateMyUser() - Static method in class controller.UserController
Update the myUser object from the listOnline
updateSelection() - Method in class view.MainFrame
It updates the selection in the UsersList It is called when the chatter selected change his pseudonym
updateUser(String, String) - Static method in class controller.UserController
Update the user pseudo in the listOnline
updateUsersList() - Method in class view.MainFrame
It updates the list of the users online It is called at the initialization of the frame or everytime the UDP listener receive a message
